## South Park: The Fractured but Whole

South Park, the long-running animated series, has made its way into the gaming world once again with the release of "South Park: The Fractured but Whole". Developed by Ubisoft San Francisco and released in 2017, this game is a sequel to "South Park: The Stick of Truth".

### Game Overview

As the name suggests, "South Park: The Fractured but Whole" takes place in the infamous town of South Park. This time, however, the focus is on superheroes. The player takes on the role of the New Kid, who is trying to fit in with the other kids in town by becoming a superhero.

The game is an open-world RPG where the player can explore the town of South Park, interact with characters from the show, and complete quests. The combat system has been revamped from the previous game with a grid-based system that allows for more strategic battles.

### Characters

One of the highlights of the game is the inclusion of fan-favorite characters from the show. Players will encounter characters such as Cartman (aka The Coon), Kyle (aka The Human Kite), and Butters (aka Professor Chaos) as they progress through the game.

In addition to the characters from the show, the game also allows players to create their own superhero character with a variety of customization options.

### Humor

If there's one thing that South Park is known for, it's its humor. "South Park: The Fractured but Whole" is no exception. The game is filled with the same crude humor and offensive jokes that the show is known for.

However, it's important to note that the humor in the game may not be suitable for all audiences. The game is rated M for Mature and contains explicit language and crude humor.

### Conclusion

"South Park: The Fractured but Whole" is a hilarious and entertaining game that is sure to please fans of the show. With its open-world gameplay, revamped combat system, and inclusion of fan-favorite characters, the game is a must-play for anyone who loves South Park. Just be warned that the humor may not be for everyone.
